OPCODE              : Hexadecimal value
RS                  : Decimal value
RT                  : Decimal value
RD                  : Decimal value
SHAMT               : Decimal value
FUNCT               : Hexadecimal value
ADDR/IMMEDIATE      : Decimal value
OFFSET              : Decimal value

I TYPE:    00000F | 00000 | 00002 | 0000000000000001
I TYPE:    00000F | 00000 | 00003 | 0000000000000001
R TYPE:    000000 | 00002 | 00003 | 00004 | 00000 | 000020
R TYPE:    000000 | 00004 | 00000 | 00004 | 00000 | 000020

Exception ADDR at 252 (none)                 : 000
Exception ADDR at 253 (zero division)        : 000
Exception ADDR at 254 (unknown opcode)       : 0E4
Exception ADDR at 255 (arithmetic overflow)  : 0F0
